title: 6 Zodiac Signs That Could Be Taurus' Soulmate

steps.title: Taurus and Virgo
steps.content: Taurus and Virgo make a super dependable, loyal pair. Both are earth signs, which makes them practical people who can easily rely on one another for anything. Taurus, as a fixed sign, is a “stabilizer”—they offer steadiness, while Virgo, a mutable sign, is flexible and adaptable. Together, they’re able to accomplish any goal and support one another unconditionally. This unstoppable pair is sure to get things done! [1] X Research source Emotional bond: Very strong. Virgo loves Taurus’ patience, and Taurus is drawn to Virgo’s gentle nature. Sexual chemistry: Exceptional. Virgo isn’t afraid to try new things in bed and knows how to satisfy a sensual Taurus. Trust: Strong. Both earth signs value commitment, though it takes time for them to build trust. Communication: Strong. Virgo is ruled by Mercury, the planet of communication, so this is naturally a communicative pair. Challenges: Virgo may not invest in the relationship until they know where Taurus stands. Taurus may need to express their feelings to Virgo to move the relationship forward.

steps.title: Pisces and Taurus
steps.content: Pisces and Taurus create the perfect blend of stability and love. Consistent Taurus brings stability to the relationship and keeps Pisces grounded. Pisces—a water sign ruled by Neptune, the planet of dreams and creativity—brings devotion and idealism, breathing romance into the relationship. Both signs have nurturing instincts, so they’ll always take care of each other and rely on one another through thick and thin. [2] X Research source Emotional bond: Exceptional! Sweet-natured Pisces knows how to help Taurus get in touch with their emotional side. Sexual chemistry: Very strong. Both signs crave a deep, intimate connection with their partner in the bedroom. Trust: Very strong. Taurus gives Pisces the support they seek, and intuitive Pisces makes Taurus feel needed. Communication: Strong. This pair doesn’t usually have a problem with communication, though Taurus’s stubbornness can interfere. Challenges: Pisces is a flexible mutable sign, which is why they don’t understand Taurus’ stubborn side. They’ll need to work on listening and compromising with one another to overcome this!

steps.title: Cancer and Taurus
steps.content: Cancer and Taurus make amazing friends as well as lovers. As one of the most nurturing signs, Cancer makes Taurus feel instantly comfortable with them, while Taurus gives Cancer the security they’re looking for in a partner. Plus, their values line up perfectly; both want a family and a warm, stable home life and believe in working hard to achieve that, so they’ll find exactly what they’re looking for in one another. Emotional bond: Exceptional. Cancer is ruled by the Moon, the planet of emotions, which makes them super intuitive; they can easily pick up on Taurus’s moods. Sexual chemistry: Very strong. Sparks fly between these sensual signs, and they bond emotionally through their intimacy. Trust: Very strong. Cancer and Taurus are two of the most loyal zodiac signs and trust one another completely. Communication: Strong. This pair understands one another without even needing to speak. Challenges: Taurus can be blunt, and Cancer is very sensitive. Taurus may need to work on being considerate of Cancer’s feelings, while Cancer may need to reign in their sensitivity when Taurus is trying to be helpful.

steps.title: Scorpio and Taurus
steps.content: Scorpio and Taurus have a magnetic attraction to one another. Though these signs are opposites on the zodiac wheel, opposites attract! Scorpio is passionate and uses that to drive the relationship forward, while Taurus is grounded and gives Scorpio the stability they need in a long-term relationship. Plus, both signs are extremely loyal, which means this pair tends to stay together for life. [3] X Research source Emotional bond: Very strong. Scorpio is a receptive and protective partner, which makes Taurus feel very comfortable with them. Sexual chemistry: Very strong. These signs are powerhouses in the bedroom and bring out one another’s inner passion. Trust: Strong. Scorpio's devotion and all-or-nothing mindset make them an easy partner for Taurus to trust. Communication: Strong. Communication isn’t usually an issue, though both Taurus and Scorpio can be stubborn (because they’re both fixed signs). Challenges: When their stubbornness flares up, a discussion can turn into a battle of wills. Compromise is the key to resolving issues between them. It’s especially important that Taurus demonstrate their trustworthiness and honesty in this relationship, since Scorpios are so slow to trust others and value the truth above all else. Reader Poll: We asked 638 wikiHow readers with the Scorpio zodiac sign, and 66% of them agreed that their biggest deal breaker is someone who lies . [Take Poll]

steps.title: Capricorn and Taurus
steps.content: Capricorn and Taurus have a similar approach to relationships. Both signs are hardworking, committed, and patient; their like-mindedness helps them feel comfortable with one another right off the bat. Material stability is also important to both of them, and between Capricorn’s ambition and Taurus’ persistence, this pair is capable of building a cozy, luxurious, and stable home life together. [4] X Research source Emotional bond: Very strong. This pair tends to be on the same page more often than not. Sexual chemistry: Strong. Both have high libidos, and Capricorn’s boldness is sure to excite Taurus in the bedroom. Trust: Very strong. Dependability is a trait these earth signs share; neither commits to a relationship unless they’re truly serious about it. Communication: Strong. Although they tend to be on the same wavelength, it can be tough for this pair to discuss their emotions. Challenges: Taurus and Capricorn make a strong pair, but both can be pretty reserved at first. They may need to work on building emotional intimacy together.

steps.title: Libra and Taurus
steps.content: Libra and Taurus share common ground through their ruling planet. A bright, spirited air sign like Libra isn’t usually the typical choice for Taurus’ soulmate, but this can be quite a sweet pair! Both signs are ruled by Venus, the planet of love, passion, and beauty, which means they have quite a few things in common. Both signs are romantics at heart, intellectual, practical, and have a taste for the finer things in life. Emotional bond: Strong. Libra will love the way Taurus dotes on them and brings stability to the relationship. Sexual chemistry: Strong. Taurus is a super sensual sign. This means they know how to create the intimate, romantic atmosphere that Libra craves. Trust: Average. Libra isn’t an unfaithful sign, but their natural flirtiness can test Taurus’ self-esteem at times. Communication: Very strong. Libra is super social and easy for Taurus to talk to, and can encourage Taurus to make compromises by coming up with creative solutions Taurus wouldn’t normally think of. Challenges: To build trust, Libra may need to spend more time reassuring Taurus, while Taurus may need to express how Libra’s flirtiness makes them feel.
